name: Extreme Car Death Racing
description:
Extreme Car Death Racing!!!
Experience the heavy and fast racer fire as a best dangerous driver and shooter while racing against the opponent. Gear up for the most thrilling and realistic death race shooting simulation and be the best among the races of world. Let’s show best racing and shooting skills because vehicles are loaded with lethal weapons like rocket launchers and bullets in your arsenal and also there are multiple vehicles to play.
Features:
Exciting multiple shooting missions
Intense high speed racing
Realistic damage destruction and deformation
High definition 3d graphics
Realistic car shooting and attacking simulation
